Reentrancy in Crowdsale.preallocate (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#426-445):
	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#428-431)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#661-693) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#678-693)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#677-693)

Crowdsale.MAX_INVESTMENTS_BEFORE_MULTISIG_CHANGE should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#214-216)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#198)
MintableToken.mintingFinished should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xa8c7f56c90b20afaae9f7a006ca2df1dfba56279.sol#890-891)
